CmdLine: yum update -y &&     yum install -y golang git wget tar &&     mkdir -p /opt/logstash/ssl &&     mkdir -p /opt/logstash-forwarder &&     wget https://github.com/elasticsearch/logstash-forwarder/archive/v0.4.0.tar.gz &&     tar zxvf v0.4.0.tar.gz -C /opt/logstash-forwarder --strip-components=1 &&     cd /opt/logstash-forwarder/ &&     go build &&     yum remove -y tar wget git golang &&     yum clean all
